an5.21:1.1: “So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaravo appatisso asabhagavuttiko ‘sabrahmacarisu abhisamacarikam dhammam paripuressati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an5.21:1.2: ‘Abhisamacarikam dhammam aparipuretva sekham dhammam paripuressati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an5.21:1.3: ‘Sekham dhammam aparipuretva silani paripuressati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an5.21:1.4: ‘Silani aparipuretva sammaditthim paripuressati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an5.21:1.5: ‘Sammaditthim aparipuretva sammasamadhim paripuressati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an5.21:2.1: So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaravo sappatisso sabhagavuttiko ‘sabrahmacarisu abhisamacarikam dhammam paripuressati’ti thanametam vijjati.
an5.21:2.2: ‘Abhisamacarikam dhammam paripuretva sekham dhammam paripuressati’ti thanametam vijjati.
an5.21:2.3: ‘Sekham dhammam paripuretva silani paripuressati’ti thanametam vijjati.
